post.description: Marks a group as archived. Archived groups cannot be assigned to new users.
Restores an archived group, making it active again.

patch.description: Marks a user as approved (admin only)

post.description: Authenticates a user and returns a token pair
Logs out the user by invalidating their refresh token

get.description: Retrieves public profile information for the user associated with the access token

post.description: Creates a new user and returns a token pair

get.summary: List discipline IDs available to me
List lecture materials available to me in a discipline

get.description: Returns a paginated list of groups
Returns approved students for the given group

get.summary: Get material metadata by ID (must have access)
Download material file by ID (ACL enforced)
Get my progress for a discipline
Get user progress for a discipline (staff)

post.summary: Set or update teacher bonus points for a student in a discipline
